etymology.description: Depicts a side view of a standing man, highlighting an arm and a leg.
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents a person standing, emphasizing human form. This direct depiction makes it easy to associate the character with the meaning of a 'person' or 'human'.

examples.chinese: 他是一个好人(他是一個好人)。
examples.pinyin: tā shì yī gè hǎo rén.

examples.chinese: 人们都知道这件事(人們都知道這件事)。
examples.pinyin: rén men dōu zhī dào zhè jiàn shì.
examples.english: People all know about this matter.
